sheet6.c_bookDatabase.subtests

Class CompleteSearchScenarioTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • test.InteractiveConsoleTest
      • sheet6.c_bookDatabase.subtests.BookDatabaseSubTest
        • sheet6.c_bookDatabase.subtests.CompleteSearchScenarioTest

  • public class CompleteSearchScenarioTest
extends BookDatabaseSubTest
    Asserts the program's correct behaviour for complete search scenarios. This means that a more or less complex input file is read in on which search operations are run. The program's complete output is asserted to match exactly the expected one.
    Since:
    31.01.2015
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Joshua Gleitze

      • CompleteSearchScenarioTest

    • Method Detail

      • publicPraktomatTest

        public void publicPraktomatTest()
        Simulates the Praktomat's public test. Asserts that:
        • the program outputs the expected search responses.
        • an error message is printed for the last search command (key isbn not allowed)

      • testAndOrAttributeValues

        public void testAndOrAttributeValues()
        Runs a test scenario with AND and OR as attribute values. Asserts that the tested class is not confused by that.

      • testHighTolerance

        public void testHighTolerance()
        Runs a test with a tolerance of 1. Asserts that the program behaves correctly in that case.

      • testLowTolerance

        public void testLowTolerance()
        Runs a test with a tolerance of 0.0000000000001. Asserts that the program behaves correctly in that case.

      • testNoTolerance

        public void testNoTolerance()
        Runs a test with a tolerance of 0. Asserts that the program behaves correctly in that case.
